column1: Thanksgiving may look a little different this year.  And that's ok.   We may not be together with all our family.  But in meeting this hardship we're all in this together.  Wishing you a very happy Thanksgiving from my family to yours!

Pardons can be used to right wrongs give people a second chance or show mercy to the repentant.  Trump uses pardons to reward political allies help personal friends and protect himself.  And Trump's pardon of Michael Flynn is his most corrupt yet.  And that's saying something.

It’s been 3 weeks since Election Day and I wanted to sit down and share some initial thoughts.  The first goal was defeating Donald Trump. And we did it. Now we can begin to repair the damage. And heal.  But we didn't win every battle.  So where do we go as a party? My thoughts: https://t.co/nOrU8SDrSg

Senator Dianne Feinstein is a tremendous champion for California. Her legacy — working for a better future for all families — is without equal.  I look forward to our continued work together on climate change healthcare gun safety and so much more in the years ahead. https://t.co/giyQ9oTMu4

If you stand up to Trump he fires you.  If you correct his misinformation he fires you.  If you don't repeat his lies he fires you.  But there are worse things than being fired.   Like betraying your country.  Thanks for your patriotism and service Director Krebs. https://t.co/eRQGYNjTLf
You know what I rarely retweet Sean Hannity.  But he's right about my message to all Americans:  The virus is still spreading. Mask up. Social Distance.  Save lives! https://t.co/7qgNk5pyuD

Joe Biden has it right:  Our nation is shaped by the constant battle between our better angels and our darkest impulses.   It’s time that our better angels prevailed.  Let’s keep it that way. https://t.co/Gh5IEMKx2N

It's over!  Joe Biden will be the next President of the United States.   Kamala Harris will be next Vice President.  And the four year nightmare of Donald Trump in the Oval Office will be over!  Thanks to you. This victory belongs to you!
Trump can’t be gone fast enough.

REMINDER:  If you’re in line when the polls close you still must be allowed to vote.   Stay in line and make sure your vote counts!

Attention Californians:  It’s Election Day! Go vote!  Polls are open until 8 pm.  If you are in line by 8 pm stay in line. You’ll be able to vote.  You can register same day.  Stay safe and wear your mask.  For your polling place and more check out:  https://t.co/ssworFFXGs

Are you feeling stressed? I can’t imagine why.   There's no better antidote than helping Get Out The Vote. And you can do it from home.  Sign up to make sure every voter gets to the polls and every vote counts:    https://t.co/kGnAZpHW2K
I have apparently been living rent free in the President’s head for a long time.  Looking forward to moving out.  One more day.  Vote. https://t.co/srwrIwb9Xp

We don’t know much about Donald Trump’s second term agenda.  But apparently priority one is to fire the world’s leading expert on infectious disease Dr. Fauci as COVID infections surge.  Another Trump term will be even worse than the first. We can’t let it happen.  Vote. https://t.co/7bzoueP5MG

Every American should agree:  Every vote should be counted.  That’s how it works. That’s how it’s supposed to work.   That a President of the United States says otherwise shows nothing is sacred he will undermine everything to win—  Even our democracy itself.

In 3 days we decide the fate of our nation.  Even as I work hard to Get Out The Vote in my own California district I’m pitching in elsewhere.  Join me Sunday as we make calls to deliver a historic victory in Arizona and send Mark Kelly to the US Senate.  https://t.co/5Xhxn7NHRC

One party wants to make it easier to vote.  One party wants to protect the right to vote.  One party wants to expand the right to vote.  One party wants to count every vote.  And the other party wants to take that all away.  Vote accordingly.

Congratulations to the @Dodgers on winning the World Series!  And in a year bereft of good news the Dodgers and Lakers gave all Californians something to cheer about.
